## Natural history notes

Fetterbush Lyonia (Lyonia lucida) is an evergeen shrub native to the Coastal Plain of the United States from Virginia to Florida. Although capable of living in dry soil conditions, it prefers wet soils that are periodically flooded. Fetterbush Lyonia produces large pink flowers, however it reproduces mostly through rhizomes forming large clonal colonies--in poor soil conditions this plant doesn't produce flowers at all.
